remMethod.val: spons(看作spoon， 勺子) ＋ or(表人) → 揭勺而起者 → 发起者

words.tran: 赞助；发起；保证人的地位；教父母身份

trans.tranCn: 发起者，赞助人，主办者；主顾
trans.tranOther: a person or company that pays for a show, broadcast, sports event etc, especially in exchange for the right to advertise at that event

trans.tranCn: 发起， 主办； 赞助， 资助； 惠顾
trans.tranOther: to give money to a sports event, theatre, institution etc, especially in exchange for the right to advertise
